abstract: Federal grand jury indicts Ammon Bundy and dozens of his co-defendants who took over national wildlife refuge in January on new charges, including one weapons charge that carries sentence of life in prison.
lead_paragraph: The federal government on Wednesday leveled additional charges against Ammon Bundy and dozens of other armed activists who took over a national wildlife refuge in Oregon in January.

headline.main: Oregon: More Charges Made in Seizure of Wildlife Refuge
headline.print_headline: Oregon: More Charges Made in Seizure of Wildlife Refuge

snippet: The federal government on Wednesday leveled additional charges against Ammon Bundy and dozens of other armed activists who took over a national wildlife refuge in Oregon in January.
